column4: I just updated dapper, and it overwrote my static nameservers in /etc/resolv.conf. Why did it do that?
The resolvconf man page talks about PPP and stuff like that, but doesn't seem to admit the possibility that one might use a static IP address with static nameservers.
if you use resolvconf, /etc/resolv.conf will change afaik
you're supposed to set the static nameservers somewhere else
So anyone who intends to use static IP should remove resolvconf first thing?
i use breezy; i had to install it manually. don't know about dapper
